IncidentDef.label: celestial impact
IncidentDef.letterText: A Celestial has found their way home on the back of a meteor, riding it down from the skies above, somehow returning in perfect health.

IncidentDef.label: strange meteor
IncidentDef.letterText: A strange meteor has impacted near your home, none of your colonists know why it's strange, they just have this feeling deep down that they should mine it.
